nodes.text: The Ultragungan Droidtech Camp was a ruined building located in the Lasay Swamp of the world of Naboo. Following the Battle of Yavin, the building was used as a camp by the droidtechs of the Ultragungan Militia. Circa 1 ABY, Boss Rugor Nass sent a spacer to the camp in order to retrieve an Ultragungan droidtech toolkit. In the toolkit, the spacer found a password allowing to bypass the self-destruct security mechanism of the Ultragungan battle droids.
